name: I WILL EAT A APPLE
description:
You are stuck on an island on your own. 

Your hungry.

Will you eat a apple?

“I Will Eat A Apple” is a short minimalistic pixel art adventure game of embracing and/or resisting the evergrowing temptations to eat a apple.

Made by Mo Alam for Ludum Dare 47.

Engine : Duality2D

Art: PixelSmash and Krita

Music : Programmed using Sonic Pi

SFX: Audacity
